basics.name: Aaron Baldwin
basics.label: Software and QA Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced Software Engineer looking for a full-time position in development, test, or product management.

highlights: Transitioned website from WordPress/GoDaddy to React on AWS
Used Google Maps APIs and location tracking to show live updates of delivery driver whereabouts
Debugged and responded to live issues with system at all hours of the week
Built Devops infrastructure including testing framework, network stack, and a CI build on Jenkins
Drafted language-agnostic test plans for product systems
Implemented automated tests at many levels of architecture abstraction
Wrote a framework and established patterns for creating unit and integration tests
Provided testing consult to engineers on other projects
Developed features and products in full-stack fashion
Attended multiple customer engagement events across the country
Test framework construction in Python and test script writing in Cucumber
Test Environment maintenance in AWS, Unix, and Bamboo
Work with PMs and developers to establish testability and customer impact
Experience with Selenium and efficient UI testing practices
HTML/CSS/Javascript
User Story Mapping
Java, JavaScript, SoapUI, Integrations
Managed integration of 3rd party software into build

work.summary: Built internal tools and test automation
highlights: Worked in C# and Java
Emphasis on parallelization and efficiency

education.institution: California Polytechnic State University San Luis Obispo
